latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Monitoring Inspection Non-Routine - Passed inspection with no violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide constant and competent supervision for children within its care
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Safe sleep environment not provided in infant toddler service safe sleep environment does not comply with US CPSC and ASTM standards
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Infant toddler staff allows infants to sleep in other than safe sleep environment fail to move infant to safe sleep environment when required more than one infant observed sleeping in a single crib or bassinet
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards
